医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
富含抗氧化剂的饮食可降低 2 型糖尿病风险，补充剂效果较差研究系统地回顾了膳食抗氧化剂、维生素 C、E 和 β-胡萝卜素对降低 2 型糖尿病风险的影响，表明与该疾病呈负相关，尽管没有观察到补充的保护作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240326/Antioxidant-rich-diets-linked-to-lower-type-2-diabetes-risk-supplements-less- effective.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240326/Antioxidant-rich-diets-linked-to-lower-type-2-diabetes-risk-supplements-less- effective.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b89f7cc0-8773-4bc5-a483-078411c2b3f4 Tue, 26 Mar 2024 19:51:00 -0400 Antioxidant-rich diets linked to lower type 2 diabetes risk, supplements less effective
ABT199/venetoclax 与塞替派的协同作用增强化疗药物对 AML 细胞的细胞毒性2024 年 3 月 14 日，Oncotarget 第 15 卷发表了一篇新的研究论文，题为“ABT199/venetoclax synergism with thiotepa增强了fludarabine、cladribine和busulfan在AML细胞中的细胞毒性”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240326/ABT199venetoclax-synergism-with-thiotepa-enhances-cyto毒力-of-chemo-drugs-in-AML-cells.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240326/ABT199venetoclax-synergism-with-thiotepa-enhances-cyto毒力-of-chemo-drugs-in-AML-cells.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e28847bd-f4a6-4505-b8d6-2ea605c20b7d Tue, 26 Mar 2024 15:49:28 -0400 ABT199/venetoclax synergism with thiotepa enhances cytotoxicity of chemo drugs in AML cells
食管癌手术：标准切口和锁孔切口显示相似的结果新研究发现，在比较治疗食管癌（食管癌）的标准手术切口和锁孔手术切口时，没有发现恢复时间和并发症之间存在差异的证据。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240326/Esophageal-cancer-surgery-Standard-and-keyhole-incisions-show-similar-outcomes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240326/Esophageal-cancer-surgery-Standard-and-keyhole-incisions-show-similar-outcomes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a946adb7-d5e5-4f31-b406-1bc4f70ca911 Tue, 26 Mar 2024 15:41:03 -0400 Esophageal cancer surgery: Standard and keyhole incisions show similar outcomes
新型无电池植入物允许用户实时监测膀胱充盈度你现在应该跑去洗手间吗？或者你能坚持到回家吗？新的植入物和相关的智能手机应用程序有一天可能会消除方程式中的猜测工作。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240326/New-battery-free-implant-allows-users-to-monitor-their-bladder-fullness-in-real-time.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240326/New-battery-free-implant-allows-users-to-monitor-their-bladder-fullness-in-real-time.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=269f7a5b-49a2-4495-af6a-1c567760b72c Tue, 26 Mar 2024 15:26:01 -0400 New battery-free implant allows users to monitor their bladder fullness in real time
研究确定了为年轻人建设心理健康友好型城市的关键优先事项随着世界各地的城市不断吸引年轻人从事工作、教育和社会机会，一项新的研究确定了支持年轻城市居民心理健康的特征。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240326/Study-identizes-key-priorities-for-building-mental-health-friend-cities-for-young-people.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240326/Study-identizes-key-priorities-for-building-mental-health-friend-cities-for-young-people.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ad0a7984-d480-45ec-9576-8900fff3cffd Tue, 26 Mar 2024 15:11:24 -0400 Study identifies key priorities for building mental health-friendly cities for young people
机器学习识别创伤患者从氨甲环酸治疗中受益大阪大学的研究人员利用机器学习来识别在接受氨甲环酸治疗后更有可能幸存的创伤性损伤患者。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240326/Machine-learning-identizes-trauma-病人-benefiting-from-tranexamic-acid-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240326/Machine-learning-identizes-trauma-病人-benefiting-from-tranexamic-acid-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=54dcbbf8-2239-4057-a7bd-3f9efd38e1be Tue, 26 Mar 2024 15:03:00 -0400 Machine learning identifies trauma patients benefiting from tranexamic acid treatment
研究揭示了小鼠口腔细菌与胰腺癌发展之间的联系新研究揭示了小鼠口腔细菌与胰腺癌发展之间的显着联系，并揭示了先前公认的口腔健康与胰腺癌（最致命的癌症之一）之间的联系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240326/Study-unveils-link- Between-oral-bacteria-and-pancreatic-cancer-development-in-mice.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240326/Study-unveils-link- Between-oral-bacteria-and-pancreatic-cancer-development-in-mice.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=caa4435c-cd33-48b8-9e30-a5ffe32f7575 Tue, 26 Mar 2024 13:13:00 -0400 Study unveils link between oral bacteria and pancreatic cancer development in mice
加州大学研究人员启动二期临床试验，测试胶质母细胞瘤的新组合疗法辛辛那提大学癌症中心研究人员组成的多学科团队已经启动了一项二期临床试验，以测试一种针对胶质母细胞瘤（GBM）的新联合疗法，胶质母细胞瘤是最致命的脑肿瘤。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240326/UC-researchers-open-Phase-2-clinical-trial-to-test-new-combination-treatment-for-glioblastomas.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240326/UC-researchers-open-Phase-2-clinical-trial-to-test-new-combination-treatment-for-glioblastomas.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7b483bcd-2788-4bec-826a-2f9c09f0484c Tue, 26 Mar 2024 13:09:40 -0400 UC researchers open Phase 2 clinical trial to test new combination treatment for glioblastomas
研究揭示遗传变异与西班牙裔/拉丁裔儿童患白血病风险增加有关急性淋巴细胞白血病 (ALL) 是最常见的儿童癌症，对美国西班牙裔/拉丁裔儿童的影响尤为严重。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240326/Study-reveals-genic-variant-linked-to-increased-risk-of-leukemia-in-HispanicLatino-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240326/Study-reveals-genic-variant-linked-to-increased-risk-of-leukemia-in-HispanicLatino-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=045ac524-f66a-4940-9dcb-672bd2cdd2d4 Tue, 26 Mar 2024 13:02:12 -0400 Study reveals genetic variant linked to increased risk of leukemia in Hispanic/Latino children
童年久坐时间与血管过早损伤有关一项新的研究显示，从儿童时期起久坐时间的增加与动脉僵硬度的恶化有关，动脉僵硬度是血管过早损伤的一个指标。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240326/Sedentary-time-in-childhood-linked-with-premature-angio-damage.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240326/Sedentary-time-in-childhood-linked-with-premature-angio-damage.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=85327128-e4ff-429a-a94d-fee805e5c409 Tue, 26 Mar 2024 12:52:00 -0400 Sedentary time in childhood associated with premature vascular damage
